description:
In this quickÂ course you will learn the easiest and yet powerful way to create your custom email address like: YourName@YourBusiness.com

The best of all? You don't need any previous knowledge, since this step-by-step guide will teach you the 'dummies-proof' method to create your professional email in minutes.

We include all the steps from A-Z like:

- Exactly how to register your domain (for free!)

- How to setup an email address with your new domain name

- How to link it with GMail so that you can send and receive emails the way you have always done.

Ready? Take this course now... for free!
title: Your Custom Email Address step-by-step in 5min - Free Guide
instructors: Photographer Valeryia M., Entrepreneur and writer Mick Johnson
